about_the_game:
One against a thousand

Mushrooms are trying to take over the world, will a lone samurai be able to overcome the threat of mushrooms filling the world?

Slashboy is a classic arcade game, the main goal of which is to score as many points as possible by destroying mushrooms. You play as a samurai who can jump from wall to wall. Everyone who gets under the blade on the way will be exterminated. The more damage is done to the mushrooms, the more points will be received.

Main features:

  • Character movement 360 degrees. Limitations - only walls, and a little mushrooms

  • Depending on the opponents, you can take damage. Samurai knows how to defend, reflect enemy attacks back at them, use opponents wisely

  • Automated skill system: combine abilities in any order and almost any quantity, all abilities are used every few hits on enemies, meters passed, or as soon as they are in the skill ring

  • All abilities can be found at the level, and for the fastest ones they can be crafted. Not all crafts are trivial, so you can experiment

  • Scalable difficulty system from the time of play. For long runs

It's time to find out how long the samurai will last?

short_description: It's time to protect the world from... Mushrooms. Play as a samurai against a crowd of mushrooms, ordinary and not so. Cut, use magic, but destroy as many mushrooms as you can. Compete with others and prove who is the real mushroom destroyer!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, French, Spanish - Spain, Korean
